remarks: The partial isomorphism B maps to a set of vectors in full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2014.)
statement:
dibss.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dibss.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dibss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibss.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dibss $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) C_ V ) $.
